param.name: DBH
param.title: Diameter at Breast Height measured at 1.4 m above the ground.

param.name: Ring radius/year
param.title: Ring radius increase per annum - see the table in 'About' for the suggested values for different species.

param.name: Age at Maturity
param.title: Age at Maturity - the end of core growth - see the table in 'About' for the suggested values for different species.

param.name: Lifespan
param.title: Expected lifespan of tree - see the table in 'About' for the suggested values.

param.name: Canopy %
param.title: Tree Canopy damage is often present in established trees and diminishes the tree's biomass.

param.name: DBH->Biomass:A
param.title: The A coefficient in the relationship of the tree's biomass to its diameter: ln(biomass) = A + B ln(DBH) see About for typical values.

param.name: DBH->Biomass:B
param.title: The B coefficient in the relationship of the tree's DBH to its Biomass.

param.name: Decay years
param.title: Years until decayed: 1 assumes that the tree is chipped and burnt; higher figures assume that the tree decays naturally; 0 assumes that the tree's timber is retained and used.

param.name: No of Replacements
param.title: If BTRS is selected, this will be determined by that standard.

param.name: Age at Planting
param.title: Typically, this is a tree of about 6 years old.

param.name: Planting delay
param.title: Replacement tree is typically planted in the next planting season.

param.name: Establishment years
param.title: Newly planted trees take about three years to establish the root system before putting on above-ground growth.

param.name: DBH->Biomass:A
param.title: The A coefficient in the relationship of the tree's biomass to its diameter: ln(biomass) = A + B ln(DBH) see About for typical values.

param.name: DBH->Biomass:B
param.title: The B coefficient in the relationship of the tree's DBH to its Biomass.
